description: Create personas of real people from their public web content. Ask questions and get answers grounded in their actual statements. Switch between personas and revisit saved profiles anytime.

configSchema.title: ConfigSchema

serper_api_key.description: Serper API key for web search

anthropic_api_key.description: Anthropic API key for Claude LLM

configSchema.description: Configuration for the Persona MCP Server.

capabilities.name: init_persona
capabilities.description:
Initialize a persona by gathering and storing their online content.

        Args:
            person_name: Full name of the person (e.g., "Alex Hormozi")
            max_urls: Maximum URLs to scrape (default: 3, recommended: 1-5)

capabilities.name: ask_persona
capabilities.description:
Ask a question to the currently active persona.

        Args:
            question: The question to ask

capabilities.name: get_current_persona
capabilities.description: Get the name of the currently active persona.

capabilities.name: switch_persona
capabilities.description:
Switch to a different persona that has already been initialized.

        Args:
            person_name: Name of the persona to switch to
